Job Title: Vice President Operations

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Distribution, Management, Manufacturing

Description:
The VP of Operations is the heart of our team, who will oversee all operations, from procurement through manufacturing, warehousing and fulfillment. A critical responsibility is relationship management with contract manufacturing, 3PL partners and key material suppliers, as well as strategic planning and oversight as part of the leadership team.
Candidates must have leadership experience at a CPG food or beverage startup. 
This is a remote position reporting to the CEO/founder. Travel to manufacturing facilities is as needed to ensure successful product manufacturing. Estimated travel needs are 4x/year including annual team retreats.
Munk Pack is a highly innovative natural foods company with a small, entrepreneurial team. Our Nut & Seed Bars and Granola Bars are found at Sprouts, Walmart, Kroger, Safeway-Albertsons, The Fresh Market, Wegman’s, and other key accounts nationwide in 11,000 locations plus ecommerce.
RESPONSIBILITIES:Production planning, oversight, and responsibility for maintaining high quality of goodsManaging relationships and coordination with contract manufacturers and suppliersOverseeing S&OP process, MRP process, procurement & sourcing, inventory management, and on-time In-full fulfillment, with 3 direct reportsResponsibility for production quality and Inventory levels, coordination with Sales and Finance on forecastingLeading key company Initiatives such as new product launches, ongoing cost savings, RFPs, cross-functional collaboration, Improving operational efficiencyContracting for certain Ingredients and packaging, following market changes that could affect pricing or supplyReporting strategies and key metrics, setting and achieving quality and cost targetsERP system oversightOther related duties
REQUIREMENTS:10+ years of operations management experience with a consumer goods companyAdvanced proficiency with Microsoft Excel, ERP systems (Netsuite preferred)Outstanding attention to detailExcellent problem solving skills, able to calmly step in when challenges arise, multi-task and pivot“Quality is key” mentality"Can do" attitudeExcited to join the Munk Pack team!
BENEFITS:monthly premium coverage for health insurance (Aetna), dental and vision plansand long-term disability insuranceand maternity leaveleaveplanclosed from Christmas Eve through New Year’s Day, in addition to PTO and paid holidaysteam retreats, weekly team “coffee break” and quarterly team building activitiesMunk Pack snacks
We look forward to hearing from you!

Experience Level (if available): None
